title: Crusher Primary Belt Replacement
description: Replace worn primary conveyor belt on crusher unit. Inspect bearings and lubrication points.
notes: Belt showing signs of wear on inner side. Order replacement part #CB-2024-A

title: Conveyor System Lubrication
description: Monthly lubrication of all conveyor bearings and drive mechanisms.
notes: All lubrication points serviced. Replaced grease in bearing housing #3.

title: Separator Magnetic Element Inspection
description: Inspect and clean magnetic separator elements. Check for debris buildup.
notes: Started inspection. Found minor debris on element #2.

title: Dryer Temperature Sensor Calibration
description: Calibrate temperature sensors and check heating element functionality.
notes: Temperature readings inconsistent. Requires immediate attention.

title: Cooler Fan Belt Adjustment
description: Adjust fan belt tension and inspect cooling system components.
notes: Belt tension slightly loose. Routine adjustment needed.

title: Screener Mesh Replacement
description: Replace worn screening mesh and inspect vibration motor.
notes: Mesh showing wear patterns. Vibration motor noise increased.

title: Emergency Crusher Repair
description: Urgent repair of crusher jaw mechanism after unusual noise detected.
notes: URGENT: Unusual grinding noise from jaw mechanism. Production halted.

title: Conveyor Safety System Check
description: Monthly safety system inspection including emergency stops and guards.
notes: Monthly safety compliance check. All emergency stops to be tested.
